name: 3D Monster H Off-Road Parking Extreme - Dirt Racing Driving Simulator FREE
name_original: 3D Monster H Off-Road Parking Extreme - Dirt Racing Driving Simulator FREE
description:
Are you ready for Extreme Off-Road Action?!? Take your Truck off-road in 10 Challenging Levels. Navigate exploding barrels, sheer cliffs, wrecking balls, volcanoes and so much more. Parking your truck in the spot sounds easy but every level is extremely challenging and deadly. Drift, jump and plan your way to victory. If you beat the game, you'll be awarded a bonus Sandbox Level for offroad fun. It's a free game so grab it today?

Compatibility: This game was designed to run on higher performance devices. Requires iPhone 5, iPad2, 5th gen iPod touch or better. Requires 512 Mb RAM.
